main event: Marines at Quantico, Virginia reported seeing strange lights in the sky, suspected to be flying saucers, multiple times over several nights.
interesting points: The lights were bright and flashed on and off in an unusual pattern,The lights were reported by marine guards during late evening hours,The lights seemed to dart across the sky at high speed and then hover,The last sighting occurred on Monday night and lasted for about five minutes,Similar reports were received from civilians in the area.
witness description: Marine guards at Quantico Marine base
